item.title: OSSEC - log rotation
item.description: body { font-family: "Noto Sans", sans-serif; } from pygments.styles import get_all_styles styles = list(get_all_styles()) print styles When SELinux enabled, some OSSEC packages will fail to rotate logs under /var/ossec/logs, which will result in crontab errors and in some cases faillure to write to logs. One way to fix this is to change context type, for this let’s first check the current context:
